snippet: Representative Jesse L. Jackson Jr., Democrat of Illinois, who has been absent from Congress since June 10, is being treated for "bipolar II depression," the Mayo Clinic said in a statement on his behalf.
abstract: Representative Jesse L. Jackson Jr., Democrat of Illinois, who has been absent from Congress since June 10, is being treated for "bipolar II depression," the Mayo Clinic said in a statement on his behalf.

headline.main: Jesse Jackson Jr. Being Treated for 'Bipolar II Depression'
headline.print_headline: Jackson Is Being Treated For a Bipolar Disorder
